short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search through your browser history with ease - Completely private and crazy fast!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the future of your past!

Historease is a revolutionary Google Chrome extension designed to transform the way you interact with your browser history. Powered by advanced LLM (AI) models, Historease offers a seamless and intelligent browsing experience, ensuring your history is more accessible, organized, and secure than ever before.

Key Features:

- Semantic Search: Effortlessly find what you're looking for with our AI-driven semantic search. Our search results are competitive with industry giants like Algolia and Elasticsearch, ensuring you get the most relevant results every time.
  
- Filter by Date Range: Narrow down your search by specifying date ranges, making it easy to locate past activities without sifting through endless entries.
  
- Bookmark Integration: Easily filter your history to show only bookmarked pages, allowing you to quickly revisit your most important sites.
  
- Domain Blocking: Take control of your privacy by blocking specific domains from being saved in your history. Keep your browsing history clean and relevant.
  
- Website Summaries: Get concise summaries for each website you visit, generated by our cutting-edge AI models. Quickly recall the essence of a page without needing to open it.
  
- Privacy First: Historease works entirely within your browser. No remote databases or servers are involved, ensuring your enhanced browser history is safe and secure with you.

How to Get Started:

1. Install: Add Historease to your Chrome browser.
2. Sign Up: Visit http://www.historease.com to create your account.
3. Load: Load your history and bookmarks into Historease to get the most out of your experience from day 1.
4. Browse: Search and navigate the web like normal! Historease runs in the background and won't interrupt your normal web flow.
5. Save Time: Navigate through your browser history fast with a variety of filter options

Historease is designed for users who demand more from their browser history. Whether you're a researcher, a professional, or just someone who values their time, Historease makes it easier to find, organize, and manage your web activities. With our state-of-the-art AI models, you can trust that your search results are accurate, relevant, and fast.
